name: Horizon 2.0
description:
The weather machine on the main island is broken, and stormy clouds surround you, blocking your travels. Complete the connected puzzle islands in order to fix the machine and part the storm.

Keyboard Controls:
Movement: WASD or arrow keys
Interact in Puzzle / Enter Island: Space
Dash in Puzzle: Left Shift
Reset Puzzle: R

Classic USB Gamepad Controls:
Movement: D-pad
Interact in Puzzle / Enter Island: A or "joystick button 0"
Dash in Puzzle: B or "joystick button 1"
Reset Puzzle: X + Y + L + R or "joystick buttons 2, 3, 4, and 5"
